fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player and submit a question.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will receive the question in their player channel without any context as to what sent the question
- You will learn what their answer to their question was
- If the first thing your target says in reply to the question is "what?" or any variation of asking what, you learn their role
